titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should postpone his visit to the People's Republic of China planned for June 1998 until all questions related to the export of sensitive satellite technology to the People's Republic of China have been thoroughly and satisfactorily answered.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 5/22/1998--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should postpone his visit to the People's Republic of China planned for June 1998 until all the questions related to the export of sensitive satellite technology to the People's Republic of China have been thoroughly and satisfactorily answered.
